name: WP Flexible Map Options
author: Kerli

sections.description: The plugin WP Flexible Map provides only shortcode attributes to configure the behaviour of the map. This plugin enhances provides an option page to set the values once for alle maps. It is still possible to override the values by using the attributes in the shortcodes.
sections.installation:
1. Upload this plugin to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Use the provided option page to configure your global parameters
sections.faq:
Which languages are supported?

With version 1.0.0 only Germain and English are supported. If you would like to provide an additional translation, please contact me via the support forum.

  • added ‘zoom’ as a new field

1.0.1

  • fix translation error

1.0.0

  • missing fields added with DE translation.

0.0.5

  • Initial release.

short_description: Provides an option page for the plugin WP Flexible Map to define the default values globally.
description: The plugin WP Flexible Map provides only shortcode attributes to configure the behaviour of the map. This plugin enhances provides an option page to set the values once for alle maps. It is still possible to override the values by using the attributes in the shortcodes.

upgrade_notice.1.0.0:
• new properties for the option page
  • database fields will be updated automatically

screenshots.caption: The plugins is only working if the Flexible Map is activated.
A simple configuration page to modify the global values.
